title: Arcade1Up Countercades Get First Discounts At Amazon For Black Friday
description: Arcade1Up Class of '81 Pac-Man & Galaga Countercade $130 (was $150) See at Amazon See at Walmart Arcade1Up Pac-Man Countercade $130 (was $150) See at Amazon Two Arcade1Up countertop arcade machines are discounted for the first time at Amazon. The Class of '81 Countercade and Pac-Man Countercade are available for $130 this weekend. Both officially licensed machines carry $150 retail prices, though Class of '81 has routinely sold for closer to $170 since Amazon restocked it in July. Class of '81 is a combo Ms. Pac-Man and Galaga machine that consistently outsells the Pac-Man edition on Amazon. If Amazon sells out, Walmart has the Class of '81 Countercade for the same price right now. Both of these compact cabinets include three preloaded Namco arcade classics, 7-inch, vertically oriented displays, and full-size arcade controls. It's worth noting that both models released ahead of the 2024 holiday season and sold out at full price. Given the budget-friendly prices, Arcade1Up Countercades are popular holiday gifts. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Lego Star Wars 1,555-Piece Imperial Star Destroyer Gets Big Discount At Amazon
description: Lego Star Wars Imperial Star Destroyer (1,555 pieces) $120 (was $160) See at Amazon Amazon has added one of the most popular Lego Star Wars ships available today to its Black Friday Lego sale. The 1,555-piece Imperial Star Destroyer is on sale for $120 (was $160) while supplies last. This Star Destroyer launched last August as part of the Lego Star Wars 25th Anniversary collection. It comes with seven minifigures, including a 25th Anniversary minifigure of Cal Kestis from Respawn's Star Wars Jedi series. The Imperial Star Destroyer is based on the ship from the opening chase scene of Star Wars: Episode IV: A New Hope. Once fully constructed, the Star Destroyer measures 18 x 11.5 x 6 inches. It's rather fitting that Amazon added the Star Destroye to its Black Friday sale, because Star Wars fans can also get the Lego version of the ship Darth Vader and his crew were chasing: Princess Leia's Tantive IV. The 654-piece Tantive IV display model is 50% off at Amazon and Walmart. You could pair both of these ships with Lego's Boarding the Tantive IV diorama, which is on sale for $38.49 (was $55) and depicts what happens after the Star Destroyer catches the Tantive IV. It's also worth noting Lego's 630-piece midi-scale model of Darth Vader's Executor Super Star Destroyer from Return of the Jedi is on sale for $40 (was $70) at Walmart. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The Best Black Friday Blu-Ray Box Sets On Sale At Amazon
description: Movie and TV show Blu-ray box set deals Catch up on favorites with these Blu-rays See at Amazon Black Friday is typically one of the best times of year to grab some entertainment, as Amazon offers big discounts on thousands of Blu-rays and DVDs. If you're looking to get as much cinematic bang for your buck as possible, you're going to want to grab a box set or two of your favorite film and TV series. This year's Black Friday deals include some great prices on film franchises like Mission: Impossible, Star Trek, and The Godfather, while TV fans can pick up full seasons of shows like Halo, Yellowstone, and South Park. To make things easier, we've listed dozens of our favorite 4K Blu-ray, standard 1080p Blu-ray, and DVD box sets on sale at Amazon. Admittedly, the 4K sections aren't heavily populated, but there's a healthy selection of content in the Blu-ray and DVD sections. DVDs are still the cheapest option for building a library of TV series, particularly, and with many people feeling disgruntled with the current era of streaming and constant subscription price increases, they've surged in popularity over the last couple of years as a cheaper--and more permanent--solution. Scroll down to see all of our favorite film and TV box set deals. And after checking all those, hit up our Black Friday Deals Hub for even more of the best deals available today. Best Movie and TV Box Set Deals Best 4K movie Blu-ray deals Best Blu-ray movie deals Best DVD movie deals Best 4K Blu-ray TV box set deals Best Blu-ray TV box set deals Best DVD TV box set deals 4K Blu-ray Box Set Deals 4K movie box setsKicking things off is a moderate list of 4K movie box sets. Gladiator fans can get both movies in one convenient bundle and store them in a snazzy steelbook, and The Godfather Trilogy is an offer you can't refuse. Feel like going boldly where many a sci-fi fan has gone before? Then check out the Star Trek collections below, for adventures set in The Next Generation and the JJ Abrams Kelvin timeline eras of the franchise. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: 1,600-Piece Hot Wheels Mercedes-Benz Building Set Is Only $48 For Black Friday
description: Brick Shop: Hot Wheels Premium Series - Mercedes-Benz 300 SL $48.49 (was $129.59) | (1,600 pieces) See at Target See at Amazon Brick Shop: Hot Wheels Elite Series - Corvette Grand Sport $29.39 (was $54) | 918 Pieces See at Target See at Amazon See at Walmart Amazon and Target have a wild Black Friday deal on the biggest building set in Mattel Brick Shop's Hot Wheels collection. The 1,600-piece Mercedes-Benz 300-SL is on sale for only $48.49 (was $130). Needless to say, this is the best deal on the set since Mattel launched its Brick Shop Hot Wheels collection in August. Multiple other Hot Wheels models are featured in the promotion, including the 918-piece Elite Series Corvette Grand Sport for $29.39 (was $54) at Target. See Brick Shop Hot Wheels deals at: Amazon | Target | Walmart Similar to Lego and Mega Bloks--which is owned by Mattel--Hot Wheels Brick Shop building sets are pieced together using a variety of different brick types and sizes. Whereas Mega Bloks' Hot Wheels sets are more playful and geared toward younger audiences, Mattel's Brick Shop kits were designed for collectors and car enthusiasts who are looking for authentic models of iconic cars from luxury manufacturers. Each Brick Shop Hot Wheels car has interactive features and comes with swappable accessories as well as a Hot Wheels diecast car. The models are built with pieces that are compatible with Lego, Mega Bloks, and other construction model brands. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Amazon-Exclusive Lego Ultimate F1 Collector's Pack Steeply Discounted For Black Friday
description: Lego Speed Champions: Ultimate Formula 1 Collector's Pack $189 (was $270) | Amazon Exclusive See at Amazon See all 10 cars Black Friday Lego Deals at Amazon Check out the deals before they're gone. See at Amazon The Amazon-exclusive 10-in-1 Lego Speed Champions: Ultimate Formula 1 Collector's Pack is on sale for $190 (was $270) for Black Friday. This massive box set includes all 10 Lego Speed Champions F1 cars in the series and an exclusive poster. If you're a Lego Speed Champions or F1 fan, you will probably need to secure the Ultimate Collector's Pack soon. The collectible bundle sold out at full price shortly after launching in March, and it remained out of stock until September. All told, you'll get 10 officially licensed race cars, 10 Lego minifigures, an exclusive poster, and a giant display box showcasing the 2,601-piece collection. The Ultimate Formula 1 Collector's Pack is one of many awesome Black Friday Lego deals that just went live at Amazon on November 28. We've included a list of other deals to check out after reading about the bundle. Racing fans will want to pay special attention to Amazon's deal on the Lego Technic & Speed Champions McLaren Racing Pack, which is discounted to $54 (was $77) and is no longer being manufactured. You'll also find three Lego Speed Champions two-car packs for only $25 each. More Lego Speed Champions Black Friday Deals Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: TCL's 3-In-1 Android Tablet With Two E-Ink Modes Drops To $150 For Black Friday
description: TCL NXTPaper 14.3-Inch Android Tablet Bundle $300 (was $470) See at Amazon TCL NXTPaper 11-Inch Android Tablet Bundle (Gen 2) 64GB: $150 (was $250) | 128GB: $180 (was $290) See at Amazon TCL NXTPaper Plus 11.5-Inch Android Tablet Bundle (256GB) $240 (was $370) See at Amazon If you're looking for an Android tablet this holiday season, you should check out Amazon's Black Friday deals on the TCL NXTPaper. The NXTPaper's main draw is its switchable display modes. With the press of the button, you can transform the display from regular Android tablet to color e-ink to black-and-white e-ink. This allows you to use the NXTPaper as a regular Android tablet as well as a drawing tablet and ereader. Amazon's Black Friday sale includes NXTPaper 14.3-inch, 11-inch, and 11.5-inch bundles. The TCL NXTPaper 14 is on sale for a $170 discount, dropping the price to $300 (was $470). The NXTPaper 11 is discounted to as low as $150 (was $250), and the NXTPaper 11 Plus is marked down to $240 (was $370). All three deals include flip cases and styluses. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The Art Of Final Fantasy 3-Book Box Set Is 60% Off At Amazon For Black Friday
description: The Sky: The Art of Final Fantasy Box Set $77.64 (was $200) Get deal at Amazon Final Fantasy fans can save big on a beautiful three-book box set that celebrates the art of legendary designer and illustrator Yoshitaka Amano. Normally $200, The Sky: The Art of Final Fantasy Box Set is on sale for only $77.64 in Amazon's Black Friday sale. This is a new all-time low for The Sky, and Amazon has limited quantities available during the promotion. Along with three hardcover books featuring artwork for the original Final Fantasy through Final Fantasy X, the set comes with a few bonus booklets and inserts as well as a gorgeous display box. The Sky: The Art of Final Fantasy 3-Book Box Set $77.64 ($200) The Sky: The Art of Final Fantasy Box Set Get deal at Amazon The Sky: The Art of Final Fantasy was originally published in limited quantities in 2013. The box set on Amazon is the second edition, which Dark Horse published in November 2023. Together, the three hardcover books include 824 pages of full-color character and world art created by Amano during the development of Final Fantasy (1987) through Final Fantasy X (2001).
